short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will break apart the query parameters in the url and decode them. Also allows you to copy them to the clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin will parse out the query parameters from a url, decode them, and display them in a popup. You can click the individual buttons to copy a paramter or you can copy portions manually.
